article_title: Labor Law: Decorating the workplace for the holidays
article_text:
An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety. You need an online service to view this article in its entirety.

Whether your workplace is more of an office setting where the decorations are purely for staff to enjoy, or a customer-driven workplace where visitors, patients or clients enter, your organization will no doubt be considering how best to decorate this season.

og.description: Now that the holiday season is fully upon is, it’s time to deck the workplace halls with festive holiday fare.
